name: Ayar  Zawgyi Comment font converter
author: kyawsan

sections.description:
Ayar Zawgyi Comment font converter is mostly based on saturngod’s MMEmbed plugin for Ayar Myanmar unicode User.

  • Support Wp touch for iPhone and iPod (include wp touch pro theme )
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Download zip file and extract it.
  2. Upload unzip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. WP Admin -> Settings -> ……
sections.faq:
Can’t see on iOS

  • TTF HTML5 font embed only support on iOS 4.0 or later

Can’t see on Android , Chrome

  • Android and chrome can’t support embed font render now

Can’t see on Mac Firefox

  • Yes, Ayar Myanmar Unicode fonts can do it.

How to get support

  • send my mail kyawsan {at} mmtalk dot com

short_description: This plugin will converte Comment font to your wordpress blog.
